resources.string: This application needs Google Play Service, you must install it first.
A good App you should have: -IT Daily News-

Hello!

    Use -IT Daily News- to know latest industry news. 

Download:
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.topfeeds4j.sample

Your use of this application is governed by a)Activating permissions of hardware that the features of this application need and work well. b)The Google Terms of Service (http://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/terms/), Google's Privacy Policy(http://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/). c)Any applicable Google service-specific terms of service of privacy policies. Google's terms of service and privacy policies may be updated from time to time and without notice.


By using the application, your agree to the use of your data and permissions of your hardware in accordance with Google's Privacy Policy and Google Terms of Service.
